testcase.name: Verify with the Plot details by Crop in Left out area details
testcase.system-out: Given the user signin with the Respective role credential details...........passed Then the page will Navigate to the Dashboard screen of the main pages.......passed Then click on the dashboard menu as Activities module name..................passed And click on the Partial Uprootment screen..................................passed Then click on the search farmer input field.................................passed And Select farmer from the auto suggestion keywords list....................passed And check with the selected farmer plot details.............................passed Then check with the Total plot area input details...........................passed And check with the Total Palm area input details............................passed Then check with the Crop in Left out area dropdown selection................passed
